message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $15000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you won't want to pass up.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, my budget allows me to spend no more than $12000 on this item. Would it be possible for us to negotiate closer to this amount?

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $13500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value this product brings.
